ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ranch-style salad dressing (such as Hidden Valley® Original Ranch®)
4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - lightly pounded to an even thickness

cookingTips: Pound chicken to even thickness to ensure uniform cooking
Coat chicken by dipping in ranch dressing, then rolling in bread crumbs
Bake at 375°F for 20-25 minutes until golden brown and internal temperature reaches 165°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does using ranch dressing as both seasoning and binding agent affect the final crust?
